EmailTemplate.textOnly: There are lots of ways you can use your ATM screens to advertise promotions, engage consumers and even target your rivals’ customers. Whether it’s segmenting by location, time of day or BIN numbers, using CRM data to drive campaigns based on customer behavior or even personalizing the screen UI to reflect your users’ specific preferences, it’s simple with NCR ATM Marketing. And personalization doesn’t just drive the top line. According to Adweek, personalization can also reduce customer acquisition costs by up to 50%.
